name: Dwarven Party Wagon
description:
Dwarven Party Wagon is an InsanityJam game based on the randomly-generated tagline "An arcade game where you party with Dwarves and the gameplay changes based on the time of day."

You are a powerful Wizard who has joined his friends, the Dwarves, on their quest for more beer money!

Use the WASD or ARROW keys to move, and E or SPACEBAR to attack with a fireball.

Kill the monsters, take their loot, and delve deep into the dungeon!

Be warned, the time of day will influence you, your Dwarven allies, and the monsters in the dungeon.

GOOD LUCK.

This game was made for a game jam, and therefore isn't really well-balanced. It doesn't have much in the way of progression or difficulty curve, but maybe someday I'll come back to this project and give it some of those things. :)
